name: Elite Media Worx
overview:
Elite Media Worx is an enterprise destined to be the premier provider of online2offline commerce; the cornerstone to online2offline commerce is finding consumers online and bringing them to real-world stores.

We continue to bridge the gap of online2offline commerce to create long-term recurring transactions between consumers and merchants. In addition, by providing merchants with analytics and access to the latest technology, we help grow their respective businesses.

At Elite Media Worx, our goal is to enhance the overall customer experience by providing consistent, seamless transactions to create a win-win partnership for our customers.

Customer service is paramount; both the merchants and the consumers are our customers and we strive everyday to put the customers first.

It is truly all about the customer and we are driven by our core values to support our customers.
